name: ClusterDisaster
description:
Player takes up the role of defensive computer program, whose system was attacked by deadly computer virus. To delete virus fom the memory of the computer, player must clense clasters of memory by closing certain areas on arena. Bigger area player closes in one go, greater the rewards, which are BitPoints. During computer memory cleansing, player must be very cautious, cause virus has its own defesive program, which will hunt down player the moment it tries to set system free of virus.
Game offers 30+ level of rising difficulty. Last , most difficult level can be played unlimited nummber of times, offering ultimate challange only for most experienced players. Players gains support in form of powerups which can for a limited time speed player up, blind foe or make foe immobile. During gameplay player gains currency which are BitPionts. For those BitPoints player can buy upgrades for example to his turning speed, movement speed or extra lives. Game is set in erly 80's neon, retro style that refers popculture of that time. If You love the nostalgia of 80's You'll definitely find this game appealing.
